in_progress.title: ButtahBot
in_progress.description: ButtahBot is a fun little discord bot I'm working on to play goofy sounds and do funny little interactions with friends.

in_progress.title: This site
in_progress.description: This site is meant to kinda be a portfolio I guess, while also being a hub for my project info and a learning experience.

complete.title: Stepper595
complete.description: A simple Arduino library meant to make stepper motor control fast and easy. Built to utilize SPI to control the motors through a 74HC595 shift register.
